articles.author: James Bikales
articles.title: US oil producers pledge to help stabilize Iran if regime falls - Politico
articles.description: American Petroleum Institute President Mike Sommers indicated the industry is more open to helping in Iran than it has been with Venezuela.
articles.content: Its an important oil play in the world, about the sixth-largest producer now they could absolutely do more, he said of the country. Irans oil industry, despite being ravaged by years of U.S. sanction… [+2099 chars]
